lead_paragraph: BALDWIN--Robert H.B. NewYork-Presbyterian is deeply saddened by the loss of Robert H.B. Baldwin, a beloved friend of our institution. Mr. Baldwin served as Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees at The Presbyterian Hospital (now NewYork- Presbyterian), and was elected a Life Trustee in 1997 in recognition of his outstanding contributions to the Hospital. A man of extraordinary talent and vision, he emphasized the importance of philanthropy as chairman of Morgan Stanley, and fostered an enduring bond between the firm and NewYork-Presbyterian that continues to advance patient care for New Yorkers and patients around the world. We offer our sincere condolences to his wife, Dorothy, his children and stepchildren and all of his family and loved ones. Frank A. Bennack, Jr., Chairman of the Board John J. Mack, Vice Chair of the Board Jerry I. Speyer, Vice Chair of the Board Steven J. Corwin, MD, CEO NewYork-Presbyterian 1/3
